text: Need Reagan Rogers for Sportsgirl campaign. Budget around $18,647, looking for 3 x 15-second TikTok, 1 x Pinterest pin, 1 x Brand ambassador content, 2 x Instagram post, 2 x Professional headshots. 3 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs January 2026. Usage rights for 8 months. Engagement period: 5 months.
